channel.title: What do i put under the variable classpath?
channel.description:
ok, under control panel, then system, then advanced, then to enviroment variables, it says to rename path and PATH and put the variable 'C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"' in it, but i cant use my jdk thing unless i have classpath, i just dont know what to put in there, please post it here,
THANKS![br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 08:38:14 AM[/size][hr] please help me!

item.title: What do i put under the variable classpath?

use the ultimate server guide, if you dont understand it then dont bother opening a server, its that simple
